name: Drizzlepath: Glass
description: Your husband is dead and you want to visit his grave. There is an abondoned house in a village, and in that house you will find a red rose. You don't want to go to your husband's grave empty handed.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit Processor: Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 750 Ti 2 GB or AMD RADEON HD 7850 2 GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: This game needs all Windows updates installed.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit Processor: Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or AMD RADEON R9 390X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: Headphones & SSD Recommended
